datasources.name: Kubernetes
datasources.description: Logz.io Uses OpenTelemetry and Fluentd with Helm charts to deploy and monitor Kubernetes architecture

telemetries.hint: Switch the toggle on if you want Logzio Telemetry Collector to collect logs from your Kubernetes cluster components and applications pods
Switch the toggle on if you want Logz.io Telemetry Collector to collect metrics from your EC2.
Switch the toggle on if you want Logz.io Telemetry Collector to collect traces from your instrumented applications in the Kubernetes environment
